funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp

Class WaveFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.WaveFrame

  • public class WaveFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Class the represents a single frame of audio.

    A HashMap is used to allow WaveProcessor objects to store any useful information about the frame - called features. This allows the processors to attach any object along with the frame to be used downstream. This is useful, for example, for storing the pitch of the frame, or its MFCCs.

    Loosely based on Joren Six's AudioEvent object from his TarsosDSP library.

    See Also:
    WaveManager, WaveFormat

      • a2dB

        public static double a2dB(double val,
                          double aRef)
        Covert a linear value to decibels (dB). The aRef parameter defines the resulting decibel scale, i.e. 1.0 for dBV, 0.775 for dBu, etc.
        Parameters:
        val - the value to convert to decibels
        aRef - the reference amplitude at 0.0 dB
        Returns:
        the resulting decibel value
